Attacks.Name: Rock Slide
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Dark Pulse
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, push the target character away short range.

Attacks.Name: Thrash
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Pupitar gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Shed Skin
Superpowers.Effect: Remove one special condition from Pupitar.

Superpowers.Name: Hardened Carapace
Superpowers.Effect: When Pupitar is targeted by an attack, reduce the damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

Superpowers.Name: Iron Defense
Superpowers.Effect: Pupitar gains immunity to all effects and cannot be damaged until its next activation or until it performs an action.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Tyranitar character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
